void newWelc() { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Welcome to Jeremy's Test Server", 8144); sendQuest("Welcome "+playerName+" please read the rules before playing. ", 8145); sendQuest("Type ::rules after you exit this window to read the rules!", 8148); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

item.title: Yet another error i dont understand
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

client.java:173: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playername location: class client sendQuest("Welcome "+playername+" please read the rules before playing. ", 8145); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Why did i get this error i am just making a Welcome message

[code] public void newWelc() {

    sendQuest("@gre@~~~@whi@W@gre@e@whi@l@gre@c@whi@o@gre@m@whi@e t@whi@o @gre@J@whi@e@gre@r@whi@e@gre@m@whi@y@gre@'@whi@s @gre@T@whi@e@gre@s@whi@t @gre@S@whi@e@gre@r@whi@v@gre@e@whi@r@gre@~~~", 8144); // Title
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest("Welcome "+playername+" please read the rules before playing. ", 8145);
    sendQuest("Type ::rules after you exit this window to read the rules!", 8148);
    sendQuest(
            "",
            8149);
    sendQuest(
            "",
         	8150);
    sendQuest("", 8151);
    sendQuest("", 8153);
    sendQuest("", 8154);
    sendQuest("@dre@Pooooo", 8155);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
}[/code]

This is the code i was editing

Read full topic
